name: PolyComply Hoechst GmbH
goal:
PolyComply Hoechst GmbH (PC) is a service provider for the plastics industry specialised in EU legislation.
On behalf of several industry sector associations, we have been closely working with the industry developing an in-depth knowledge and wide experience in EU Regulatory Compliance, Association Management and Projects & Studies.
Due to increasing complexity of EU legislation, companies need more legal and technical advice. Companies involved in the plastics industry need support on how to cope with this burden and our team can provide these companies with the best expertise and knowledge.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: All topics relevant for the plastics converting and recycling industry such as REACH, food contact, packaging and packaging waste directive, medical devices regulation, eco design, recycling, circular economy, toxicology....
customers: Bilcare Research GmbH,Mitsubishi Polyester Film GmbH,Industrieverband Kunststoffbahnen e.V. - IVK Europe,European Rigid PVC Film Association e.V.
